name: Inize Warrior
description:
!WARNING FOR STREAMERS, THE GAME IS GOING TO SAY YOUR PC USERNAME! [ABOUT THIS GAME]:

Welcome to Inize Warrior, a pixel art RPG with platforming elements, in a dark age where numerous hostile monsters have suddenly appeared and invaded the entire world, it's up to warriors to defeat them and end this nightmare, led by worldwide famous scientist, Dr. Primo.

In this game you play as c̶̨̛̛͎̲̺͍̗͓̲̑̐̉̋́̍͋̃̑̆̅̇͠'̸̥͈̲̼̱̟̜̣̠͚̑̈̃̀́̇͘͝y̸̡̨̬͎͕̭̖͙̺̘̹̰͔̾̄̒̆̌̏̊̊̉̏̒̄͜ͅd̵̡̩̜̯͕̼̳͚̗̣̐̆̎̍̓̏̐͒͊͌̈́̿͐͘͝[̴̢̢̧̟̱̲̝̭͓̗͎̈̑̈́̕̕n̶̜̺̯̤̩̪͔̤̬̦̘̞̘̾̄̽̂͑̒͆̆͗̋̀̌̀̚ , accomplishing his lifelong dream of becoming a warrior, explore the vast Sevia Island as you fight off the monster invasion threatening the entire world!

  [FEATURES]:
  • Use your own unique ability, "Observe", to check your enemy's health points and become invincible on their next attack! It can't be used twice in a row.
  • Watch out for field hazards! Fighting enemies won't always be easy when they're unreachable, or w̷̪͉͎̎̈́́ʜ̷̛̗̖͓͗̃ɘ̸̢̳͍̓̌͝ṉ̷̱͚̆̋̾ your movement's altered, anything can happen when the entire world is the battlefield!
  • Fear meter: Watch out for scary or strong looking enemies, if your fear meter fills up you will not be able to fight properly!
  • Use three different types of weapons: close combat, swords and shooters, each can also have unique abilities!
  • 8 chapters, each of them expanding on a certain character's backstory!
  • Side missions, can't be an RPG without optional content!
  • Don't just stand there waiting for the enemy to attack you, dodge their attacks!
  • Choose your upgrade every time you level up! Get some extra HP, Attack or Defense points!
  • An untold story, only those lucky enough are able to even hear part of it
  • Ɔ̷̛̜͉̬̲̱̈̓̇̊o̵̤̩̳̬̬̾̎̌̈̾m̴̧̜͚̠̪͆͛͐͌̿ɘ̶̙͓̦̱̗͂̅̇̿̏ ̷̧̱͔͎̗̔͒̇̃̚ö̶̧̝͙͍́͋̓̍̈͜n̴̠̜͈̫̹͌͋̇͊͒,̵̯̯͙̝̠̊̏͆̕͠ ̴̧̨̪̫̬̌̄̆͌̍į̴̱̦̲̮͎͐̎̽̿͝ὐ̸̪̪͕̼͚̈́̅̌̀ƨ̴̤̟͖̖̬̿̂̎̓̓Ɉ̵̬̙̮̯̀̎̇̈̚ͅ ̶͍̬͓̣̲͗̇̔̀̕ɒ̷̧͍̫͙̰́̌̊̆́ ̸̝̼̙͍̜̔͒̈́̋́d̶̡̢̯͕̤͐̐́͘͠ḯ̵̩͓͕͍̲̏̏̾̕Ɉ̶̨̧̭͔̯̏̃̀̓́ ̸̧̨͍̳͂̏͗́̆͜m̵͈̮̩̞̗̐̀̍̓͛ǒ̴͎̩͈̠͕͋̅́͝ɿ̷̘͖̯͉̬͂͂̿̕̕ɘ̸͇͖͇͕̳̋̂͘̕͝,̶̡̥̜̹̮̓͐͌̓͝ ̶̠̼͎͓̔̔̿͋̃͜i̵̙̦̤͊̇̽̒͝ͅͅ ̵̛̰̙͖͓͉̍̒̎̕ɔ̸̧̝̮͓̫̇̓̆̌͘ɒ̶̢͈̱̬̥̊̿͒͒̐n̵̟̝̬͍͆̈́̀͜͝͝ ̸͚͉̖̰̓̽̋̎̈́͜b̵̛͚͉͎̘̣̿̔̏͘ơ̸͙̻͇̭͎͗̈́̈́̀ ̶̨̺̞̦̜̾̐́͊͝Ɉ̸̖͇̺͇̇̉́̒̚͜ʜ̸̨̼̱̲̪̆͋͗͒̏i̵̡̛̘̲̼͙̾̓͝͠ƨ̶̧̬̤͍͙͋̅̓͊͝.̵͉̙̝̲͆̆̿̈́͗͜.̴̡͖̞̜̣͛͌̄̏͝.̵̪̮̫̬̥̀͐́͂́
  [MEET THE CAST]: The protagonist   You, the main character, a fearless(?) warrior! Your friends   Ava, the persistent and determined gal.
  Sean the shy guy.   Cory, the videogame loving pal.   John, the clever prodigy...?   Ethan, the short tempered dude. Various characters Luis, the efficent (and incredibly serious) warrior.  sioso be lazy Dr. Primo,  leader of the warriors.    ???
   Tom, Dr. Primo's brother      Y̵̡͕̬̦͉͆̈́͌̃̽ɘ̸̠̗͕̥̟̍̎̽̆̏ƨ̶͖͕̱̺̹̊͒̈́͂̌!̵̡̳̙̥͉͆̅͊̅͠ ̴̢͍̣̠̃́̓̏͘͜I̷̧̧̭̺̳͌͆͐̽̾Ɉ̴̬̬̟̘͉̋̍̒̑̌ ̷͍̪͇̠͂̈͛͐̾ͅʜ̵̩̼͙̠́͑͐̅͗͜ɒ̵̧̠̫̪͙̅̍̅̂͝ƨ̸̠͚̫̻̙̎̈́̏̔͋ ̴̛̲̲̞̎͂̈́͠ͅͅɔ̶͙̣̩̦̣͆͛͗̈́̕ǫ̵̱̤̖̖͆̀̔̾̆n̴̦̱̼̝̫̉̀̏͝͠!̸̭͔͉̮͖̋͆̓̾͌ ̷͉͉̪̮̩̔̈́̍̂͆Ã̸͉̲̱̙͋̐̃̓ͅd̴͙͔̗̖͔͗̔̑̀̊ơ̴̗̗̝̙̣͂̆͐́ΰ̴͙̠͇̣̝̈́̚͘͝Ɉ̸̹͕̙̤̲͆́͊̐̾ ̸̦̻̫̞͓̽͆͛̊͑Ɉ̴̯̘͉̤̝̊͒́͐͂ỉ̸͍̬͈͚̗́̍̍̕ṃ̴̨̯̟͍̿̋̊͋͠ɘ̷̛̭̗͖̟̝͗̋̋͋!̶̜̺̱̟̻͒̄̌̍͝ ̵̥̜̝̥͓̊̊̐͒͘H̶̤̩̰̹͕̆͊̽̿́ɘ̶̱͈̖̦̻̂̆͗͘͝l̶̛͕̼̺̫̦͑̍͐͘l̴̳̮̞̺͕͊͂̎̐̕o̴͖̖̙̙̝͐̇̃̓̃?̷̥̣̻̺̞̓̓̋̑͝ọ̵̧͍̺̞̽͛̑͒̆υ̷̖͙͎̪̐̀̈̿̕ͅ ̵̧̛̠̭̤̰̄͋̕͠ʜ̴̛̗̮͎̦̙̂̂̀̊ɘ̷͓͚̩̹̪̄̒̉̀͠ɒ̴̨̲͈͕̉̽͊̅̂ͅɿ̷̢̜̫̻̠̍͋͐̅̈?̴̺̼̘̣͙́̇͛̀̕l̷̛͈͇̟̯͙̈̄̾̌?̵̻̳̟̀̇̓͊͘͜ͅ?̶̜̻̲̰͚͊̾͐̇͐ Chapter 2 is currently in development. Updates can be found on my twitter account:
https://twitter.com/VintoPixel
   [SPECIAL THANKS]

The entire game was developed entirely by me, however my friend Twinseer did an impressive job with quality assurance and he deserves a shoutout: https://twitter.com/All_Voyant

I don't think i would have been able to be motivated enough to continue without my other friends' support, they also deserve a spot in the hall of fame.
